message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me halfway?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  While I can't go as low as $120, I could come down to $180.  It's a high-quality item and I'm sure you'd be happy with it.
I understand it's a high-quality item, but I'm still looking to save some money. I can do $160, can you meet me at that price?
